net.hockeyapp.android

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends Object

    Description

    Various constants and meta information loaded from the context.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromContext

        public static void loadFromContext(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes constants from the given context. The context is used to set the package name, version code, and the files path.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use. Usually your Activity object.

      • getHockeyAppStorageDir

        public static File getHockeyAppStorageDir()
        Returns a file representing the folder in which screenshots are stored.
        Returns:
        A file representing the screenshot folder.
